column4: So, any ideas with regards to my keyboard? Sorry for te ongoingness, but Im confident that Ive covered all the bases I can see

Ever since I got Ubuntu, the only way to generate the  and  was to DOUBLE tap the pertainant key [with/out shift] . If I tap it once, the next key I press comes out, if applicable, with an accent character.  + [x]  gives umlauts (), +[x]  gives (). This isnt an issue, and is kinda cool as it lets me do mlauts. However, the  and  marks dont work when programming Python, which Iam trying to learn. I think
That happened to me using SciTe, but not using Gnome. Beats me.
What kb layout are you using, btw?
can I change it so it just does ' by default>?
